text:
[Verse]
Dancing in the starlight
Hopes that shine so bright
Whispers in the night
Chasing dreams we fight

[Verse 2]
Hearts that never tire
Burning with desire
Shooting past the fire
Love that takes us higher

[Chorus]
Stardust dreams we hold
In the night so bold
Stories never told
In our hearts unfold

[Verse 3]
Skies that paint the tale
Love that will not fail
On this ship we sail
Through the cosmic gale

[Bridge]
In the stars we find
All we've left behind
In the night we'll bind
Hearts and souls aligned

[Chorus]
Stardust dreams we hold
In the night so bold
Stories never told
In our hearts unfold
title: Stardust Dreams
